translations: v．嘲笑，讥讽：对某人或某事表示轻蔑或不敬。

sentences.translation: 约瑟夫的母亲根本不理别人的嘲笑。

sentences.sentence: Scoffing four squaresof chocolate a day can improve your memory, claim experts at Oxford University.
sentences.translation: 牛津大学的专家称，每天吃四块巧克力能够提高人们的记忆力。

sentences.sentence: So if you're planning on eating an Easter egg, you shouldn't be scoffing crisps and pastries as well.
sentences.translation: 所以，如果你打算吃复活节彩蛋，那么你不应该再去贪吃薯条和馅饼了。
